name: Apple iPhone
description: Elevate your mobile experience with the iPhone, featuring cutting-edge technology, exceptional camera quality, ample storage, and the latest iOS. A symbol of innovation in the smartphone world.

name: Pixel 6
description: Elevate your mobile experience with the Google Pixel 60,000, boasting a 6.4-inch screen, dual 50 MP cameras, 128 GB storage, and Android 12. The pinnacle of smartphone innovation.

name: ASUS ROG Strix 15
description: Elevate your gaming with the ASUS ROG Strix 15 laptop - unmatched performance, high-refresh display, and gaming power in a portable package. The ultimate gaming innovation.
